import image1 from "./images/image1.jpg" import image2 from "./images/image2.jpg" import image3 from "./images/image3.jpg" import image4 from "./images/image4.jpg" import image5 from "./images/image5.jpg" import image6 from "./images/image6.jpg" import image7 from "./images/image7.jpg" import image8 from "./images/image8.jpg" import './Gallery.css'; const imageArray = [ image8, image7, image6, image5, image4, image3, image2, image1, ]; const imageTitle = [ 'image 8', 'image 7', 'image 6', 'image 5', 'image 4', 'image 3', 'image 2', 'image 1', ]; const imageDesc = [ 'image 8 here', 'image 7 here', 'image 6 here', 'image 5 here', 'image 4 here', 'image 3 here', 'image 2 here', 'image 1 here', ]; const styleTextContainer = { textAlign: 'center', } export function Gallery() { return (
{imageArray.map((image, i) => (

{imageTitle[i]}

{imageDesc[i]}
))}
); }
